titleInfo.title: Jewish Leaders with the Colorado Governor

physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 8 x 10 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: Stamped on back of photograph: ''Albert O. Corwin, Technical Photographer; 3227 Albion St. - Dexter 2843; Denver 7, Colorado.'' Handwritten on back of photograph: ''1954; l to r Governor, Rabbi Kauvar, Joe Schwayder, Adolph Keisler.''

mods.abstract: Left to right Governor Daniel Thornton, Rabbi Charles Kauvar, Joe Schwayder, Adolph Keiser, and an unidentified man pose together.

name.namePart: Kauvar, C. E. Hillel--(Charles Eliezer Hillel),--1879-1971
